name: thermoconvert
title: ThermoConvert
description: Instantly convert between all major temperature scales
author: kud

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Convert Temperature
commands.subtitle: Between All Units
commands.description: Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin, Rankine, and Réaumur

preferences.name: defaultUnit
preferences.title: Default Temperature Unit
preferences.description: The default unit to convert from

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
